name: Gem Swipe
description:
Test your swiping skills in this exciting, ultra addictive gem matching game, featuring multiple fun modes. Use awesome power-ups to help you along, and play through numerous gem packed levels as you try your hardest to master the game.

FEATURES

* Super-charged match-3 puzzle game play.
* Four unique modes; Arcade, Gem Collector, Score Panic and Time Attack
* Multiple gem types; jewel, diamond, ruby, crystal, emerald and many more.
* Each mode is easy to learn, yet hard to master.
* Explosive power ups.
* Separate leader boards for each mode and a combined board to show who's really king or queen!
* Progress is saved in every mode - try out the different modes without losing your saves.

ARCADE MODE
Match trapped gems to release then from the silver tiles on the board. The level is complete when all the gems have been released. Watch out for 'locked' and frozen gems. Try and swipe long chains of gems to earn bonus points and power ups. This will be key to your success in the higher levels.

GEM COLLECTOR
Collect the required number of gems of each color to complete the level. Sounds simple, right?

SCORE PANIC
Can you reach the target score before your time runs out? The target score is increased after every level making this mode more and more challenging. Just don't panic!

TIME ATTACK
Collect a target number of gems as you race against the clock, gem colour is not important, just get them! Lookout for the 'Clocked Out Crystal' - it's really going to help you with its time freezing abilities!
